Test Piece Contest
Iphigenia in Tauris
Pomona Gardens, Manchester 2nd Annual Contest 1st prize was £50, euphonium valued £27, cornet valued £20 and medals valued at £10. Prizes amounted to about £250, including £85 worth of instruments from Joseph Higham's, and £43 worth of instruments from F. Besson & Co.
Besses won £10
